root.name: addChild()
root.description: This is a new reference entry for Processing 2.0. It will be updated shortly. For now, please check the Examples to see how to use this new syntax.

parameter.label: sh
parameter.description: PShape: any variable of type PShape

parameter.label: who
parameter.description: PShape: any variable of type PShape

parameter.label: idx
parameter.description: int: the layer position in which to insert the new child
